Name: Reilla ~Sweets Adventure~
About the game: This game was created as part of Viking's newcomer training program Depending on your PC environment, the game may not run properly Also, unforeseen problems may occur during the game Please be aware of this A controller is required to play this game! A magical world full of sweets! The heroine, Leila, is a wizard girl who loves sweets. She comes to the world of sweets with her 'Sweets Parasol,' a magical umbrella that turns sweets into power! A magical sweet adventure filled with sweets begins now! A great adventure in the sweet world by a sweet lover. Side-scrolling gliding action with fun fluffy controls Adventure through the world of sweets, using the unique 'gliding' action of umbrellas! Gliding is not the only action! Attack by swinging umbrellas!ã€€Attack by firing candies! Take down the enemies that get in your way with a variety of actions! Cute enemies fused with sweets Sweets creatures will be terrorizing Leila's adventures! There is more than one way to clear! There are different routes and secret areas in the stage! Walk around the corner, take a big, bold jump, and Make your own way.
